message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper proposes a novel approach to image captioning, which is a task related to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also introduces a language module with an adaptive copy mechanism and a Selective Copy Memory Attention mechanism, which are related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on the MS COCO dataset, which is related to information retrieval (cs.IR).
